body:
The num to tensor case seems to be more complicated. Do we want methods to be able to be called on primitives - i.g.,  1.unsqueeze(0) 

Maybe we could not allow conversion on tensor arguments which are not specified with "self" ?
body_html:
The num to tensor case seems to be more complicated. Do we want methods to be able to be called on primitives - i.g., 1.unsqueeze(0)

Maybe we could not allow conversion on tensor arguments which are not specified with "self" ?
body_text:
The num to tensor case seems to be more complicated. Do we want methods to be able to be called on primitives - i.g.,  1.unsqueeze(0)
Maybe we could not allow conversion on tensor arguments which are not specified with "self" ?
